Online Learning Services
Learning Management & Evaluation System (LMES)
LMES is the University's institutional Learning Management System. For course set up in the system, it allows students to access course materials provided by instructors, communicate with instructors and classmates, submit course assignments and evaluation. Teaching staff may access SFQ reports there as well.
Student Center
Student Center
This page includes (1) My Personal Details; (2) My Finances; (3) My Class Schedule / Class Enrollment and (4) My Academic Records. Logon using ITSC Network Password required.
